forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 9 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, ushering in a day of sunlit promise. The skies, clear and vibrant, stretch toward a radiant high near 65, while a west-southwest breeze dances through the streets, stirring the air with a refreshing energy. As the morning progresses, the brisk winds—occasionally gusting up to 23 mph—bring with them whispers of the Pacific, hinting at the nearby ocean's embrace, yet today, fog seems reluctant to make its presence known.

As evening approaches, the warmth of the day will give way to a serene twilight, dropping to around 53 degrees. The fresh air, now coaxed with a hint of coolness, creates an inviting perspective for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet sit in one of the city's many parks. Layered clothing would serve well today; a light jacket would offer comfort as the breeze picks up but the sunshine offers just enough warmth to enjoy mid-day moments outside. A visit to a cozy café, where one might sip a warm cup while gazing out at the sweeping views, could beautifully complement the day's tranquil mood. Embrace the simplicity of this fine day, where the elements conspire to make even the ordinary feel remarkable.
